page.title: 20ANNUAL EVENTS IN WHALTON
page.content: Village events held on an annual basis are:_ April_ Village Hall Cheese and Wine Party July_ The Baal Fire Old Folks Luncheon Club Outing The Church Fete August_ Village Hall Flower and Vegetable Show December_ Church Bazaar and Christmas Show Boxing Day Meet of Morpeth Hunt The Village Hall also runs a "100 Club Draw" to help raise funds. The Flower and Vegetable Show was restarted 4 years ago after a lapse of more than 20 years and is one of the most popular and well supported events of the year
